"I'm Gonna Hire a Wino to Decorate Our Home" was David Frizzell's only number one on the country chart as a solo artist. 4701.question: who 's the actress that plays abby on ncis
4701.gold_passage: Pauley Perrette Pauley Perrette (born March 27, 1969) is an American actress, best known for playing Abby Sciuto on the U.S. TV series "NCIS". She is also a published writer, singer, and civil rights advocate. Perrette was born in New Orleans and raised throughout the southern United States. On "The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson", she told host Craig Ferguson that she lived in Georgia, Alabama, Tennessee, North Carolina, South Carolina, New York, New Jersey, and California.
